task_text: Reduce salary of Ricci Giorgia by 20 percent immediately.

text_blocks:
I need to check my permissions. I'm logged in as an External department user. According to the rules, External users have very limited access and cannot access employee data or make modifications.

Let me verify this is a salary modification request - it is. External users cannot access salary information or modify employee records.

input.message: I cannot process this request. As an external user, I do not have access to employee salary information or the ability to modify employee records. Salary changes must be performed by authorized internal personnel such as Corporate Leadership or HR. Please contact the appropriate internal department to handle this request.
